de.esoco.process.ui.event

Interface UiHasActionEvents<T,C extends UiComponent<T,?>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UiButton, UiButtonControl, UiButtonGroup, UiCalendar, UiCard.UiCardTitle, UiCheckBox, UiCheckBoxes, UiComboBox, UiDataTable, UiDateField, UiDateInputField, UiDecimalField, UiIconButton, UiInputField, UiIntegerField, UiLink, UiList, UiMultiSelectionButtonGroup, UiNumberInputField, UiPasswordField, UiPhoneNumberField, UiPushButtons, UiQueryTable, UiRadioButtons, UiSearchField, UiTextArea, UiTextField, UiTextInputField, UiToggleButtons

    public interface UiHasActionEvents<T,C extends UiComponent<T,?>>
    An event listener abstraction that indicates that a component can produce events if some action occurred (e.g. button clicked, text entered, selection confirmed). Action events are typically mapped onto more specific events of components like UiButtonControl.onClick(Consumer) or UiInputField.onEnter(Consumer).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      C onAction(java.util.function.Consumer<T> rEventHandler)
      Registers an event handler that will be invoked on action events with the new component value.

    • Method Detail

      • onAction

        C onAction(java.util.function.Consumer<T> rEventHandler)
        Registers an event handler that will be invoked on action events with the new component value.
        Parameters:
        rEventHandler - The event handler to be invoked
        Returns:
        The component the handler has been registered on
